sentence: A red apple sits on a white table to the left of a brass lamp
A blue mug on a wooden desk in front of a stack of colorful papers
A green book open under a white lamp with a bronze clock next to it
A black bicycle leaning against a red brick wall near a potted fern
A brown teddy bear on a pink cushion partially hidden by a glass vase with yellow tulips
Red high-heeled shoes under a silver coat rack beside a blue umbrella
An orange typewriter on the edge of a dark wooden table with a stack of white paper to its left
Yellow pencil sharpener on a blue book next to a round, white clock
Silver laptop open beside a black coffee mug on a gray desk mat
Green potted plant in front of a small, rectangular picture frame on a wooden shelf
Orange basketball on shiny, polished floor to the left of white sneakers
Soft, purple scarf draped over a brown leather chair near a small, gold table lamp
Clear glass bowl filled with red and green apples on a marble countertop near a stainless steel toaster
Blue backpack leaning against a tall, beige locker door beside a red water bottle
Black and white striped cushion on a red armchair next to a low, round, glass-top coffee table
Wooden cutting board with a loaf of bread and a silver knife to its right on a granite kitchen counter
Small, white ceramic bird statue on a windowsill beside a green succulent in a terracotta pot
